scripts.release:android:alpha: sh scripts/env_manager.sh alpha && fastlane android beta --env default
scripts.release:android:beta: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && fastlane android beta
scripts.release:android:prod: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && fastlane android prod
scripts.release:ios:alpha: sh scripts/env_manager.sh alpha && fastlane ios beta --env default
scripts.release:ios:beta: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && fastlane ios beta
scripts.release:ios:prod: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && fastlane ios prod
scripts.android:alpha: sh scripts/env_manager.sh alpha && ENVFILE=./environments/alpha/.env.alpha react-native run-android --variant=release --appIdSuffix alpha
scripts.android:dev: sh scripts/env_manager.sh dev && ENVFILE=./environments/dev/.env.dev react-native run-android --appIdSuffix dev
scripts.android:prod: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && ENVFILE=./environments/prod/.env.prod react-native run-android --variant=release --appIdSuffix prod
scripts.android:staging: sh scripts/env_manager.sh staging && ENVFILE=./environments/staging/.env.staging react-native run-android --appIdSuffix staging
scripts.ios:alpha: sh scripts/env_manager.sh alpha && ENVFILE=./environments/alpha/.env.alpha react-native run-ios --scheme shayr-alpha --simulator="iPhone X" --configuration Release
scripts.ios:dev: sh scripts/env_manager.sh dev && ENVFILE=./environments/dev/.env.dev react-native run-ios --scheme shayr-dev --simulator="iPhone X"
scripts.ios:prod: sh scripts/env_manager.sh prod && ENVFILE=./environments/prod/.env.prod react-native run-ios --scheme shayr-prod --simulator="iPhone X" --configuration Release
scripts.ios:staging: sh scripts/env_manager.sh staging && ENVFILE=./environments/staging/.env.staging react-native run-ios --scheme shayr-prod --simulator="iPhone X"
scripts.reset_node_modules: rm -rf node_modules/ && npm cache verify && npm install
scripts.android-linux: react-native bundle --platform android --dev false --entry-file index.js --bundle-output android/app/src/main/assets/index.android.bundle --assets-dest android/app/src/main/res
